attributes.action: Reverse the ban on the XL Bully breed & call for licensing of breeding.
attributes.additional_details: Sunak has assumed it’s XL’s that are attacking people when it isn’t. It’s mongrels owned by aggressive breeders.
attributes.background: Reverse the ban of the XL Bully breed. It’s the owner, not the dog.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
